messages.content: How can I obtain the ComfyUI-CascadeResolutions node?

You can obtain the ComfyUI-CascadeResolutions node by cloning the GitHub repository using the command 'git clone https://github.com/GavChap/ComfyUI-CascadeResolutions .' while in the 'custom_nodes' directory.
What is the purpose of the Cascade Resolutions node?
The purpose of the Cascade Resolutions node is to allow users to select x and y sizes from a list to control the resolutions of the images or videos being generated in ComfyUI.
What specific sizes can be selected for the x and y dimensions in the Cascade Resolutions node?

The specific sizes that can be selected for the x and y dimensions in the Cascade Resolutions node are not provided within the document. The document only states that the sizes can be picked from a list.
Does the image or screenshot provided in the document demonstrate the Cascade Resolutions node in action?

Yes, the image or screenshot provided in the document, with the name '2024-02-26_02-09', demonstrates the Cascade Resolutions node in action, showing the user interface where the x and y sizes can be selected.
